website_summaries.verdict: Traditionally ignored in the active watch community, golfers will enjoy this device designed especially for them.
pros: Relays course updates from your smartphone
Shows yardage to hazards, lay-ups, and greens
Keeps track of score, distance, and time
Preloaded with data from 34,000 international courses
cons: Does not track steps, only golf data

customer_reviews.title: Great range finder!
customer_reviews.text: My sky caddie malfunctioned after several games this summer. As my car gps is a tomtom, which I like very much, I decided to give this watch a try. Love it! Much better built than the sky caddie, easy to use and very accurate. This watch is also a little less expensive than the sky caddie and much less expensive than other comparable range finders. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great about it so far
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about it so far. Yardage to hazards is a nice feature. Have both the Garmin and tom Tom and recommend the Tom Tom
customer_reviews.author: Dixie L. Rea

customer_reviews.title: Flawed but well taken care of
customer_reviews.text: I had the watch for less than 2 months. Apparently my watch was flawed since it would not hold a charge. I had to return it. I was extremely impressed with the care and concern of the people at Tom Tom. They went out of their way to take care of my return. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch is dead after only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The watch will not charge after 3 months. The watch will show fully charged, after 10 minutes shows no battery charge display. When it did charge, the watch itself is an older model so it wouldn't download sync with the website. It was only good for telling time and golf GPS. For the most part the GPS was accurate but there was always one hole at the course I play which the watch would not display accurate yardage. I could be under 100 yards away from the green and it would display 250 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch! I'm not a watch person at all, but didn't enjoy fumbling with my phone to get the yardage. I used the watch for 36 holes before I had to use it. Just as I was falling in love with it my dog chewed up the strap. TomTom does not offer replacements. Thank got I bought the extended warranty. Got a new one on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Drewanskie

customer_reviews.title: It is an attractive watch and was sad to return it
customer_reviews.text: I could not use it,because I only had my I Pad with me on holiday, so it would not sync with the I Pad. It is an attractive watch and was sad to return it, that is why I only give it 3 stars. I bought a golf buddy instead, that I could put on and go golfing with immediately instead of this syncing rigmarole. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Masadoon

customer_reviews.title: Very Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great Value, I didn't want to link to my cell phone. I wish there was replacement bands available for this model, haven't found one yet. Also wish this would automatically found the hole I am on (helpfull in a shotgun start) but definetly not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Deneweth

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Impressed. The distances on the hazards were super helpful my first time out. Used it a few times now, and seriously am upset I didn't get this earlier to help me on the course. Seems to have more features than other watches but is still simple. Definitely recommend it to anyone no matter what level of golfer.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy, accurate and great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. He wanted something with minimal set up, that he could basically just take to a course, press a button and play. He was initially worried because there is no button or option to turn off the watch when not playing, but you can turn it to clock mode which turns off the GOS and basically acts like a wrist watch, so it uses minimal battery. He has played one runs with it since turning it on Christmas Day and 12 days later it still has battery life. He is very happy with all the features and how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great gold watch every thing I hoped for and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: No good watches out there
customer_reviews.text: Works when it wants.. nog a good watch out there.. the band broke after six months.. and trust me im easy with things like this
customer_reviews.author: Kayejohn

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs UP!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Tom Tom Golfer for my friend who had a Garmon one before but it quit working. He has used this one 3 or 4 times and says it works great! He's very happy with it and it looks nice as well. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hartman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Once you update it on the website/app, it doesn't work any longer. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best looking GPS watch
customer_reviews.text: The best looking golf GPS watch. Everybody misunderstood it for an iwatch! I use it for both as a watch and GPS device. After 2 rounds the battery is dead. For me essentially I have to recharge after every round.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lai

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome way to golf
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome way to golf, knowing how far out you are allowes you to choose the right club !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ARNELL JONES

customer_reviews.title: The watch itself was pretty. But when I plugged it in
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself was pretty. But when I plugged it in, it didn't charge. The screen was also damaged and fuzzy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleena

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very accurate. The wrist band attachment could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Routhier

customer_reviews.title: just an easy alternative to the larger GPS units
customer_reviews.text: If you want distance to the green without all the fancy extras, this is it. I didn't need all the bells and whistles, just an easy alternative to the larger GPS units.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: love it, the best golf I've used and super ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much, love it, the best golf I've used and super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used only 2 month now. But battery doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: One star I used only 2 month now . But battery doesn’t charge any more . I want to get refund it .
customer_reviews.author: Young Ko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's fast, faster and easier to use than the sky golf watch I bought!!! The only thing not satisfactory is the score option.
customer_reviews.author: john giusti

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my game...Truly enjoy my TomTom golf watch!! Had trouble getting it set up but customer support helped me and it works great!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: James Parrott

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise it is working great.
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out some of the functions, but otherwise it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Barb G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have four gold gps, and this one is the absolute best!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Skinner

customer_reviews.title: The function is good. The battery and charging is a different story
customer_reviews.text: The function is good. The battery and charging is a different story. I can charge it the night before and it's dead before the 10 th hole.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A Cohen

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent device! Shows distance to hole
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. It is an excellent device! Shows distance to hole, front/back of green and also distance to hazards. The battery life is good enough for a round or two, but my main complain is that you cannot turn this device off. Have had a few times where he left it in his bag and went to play and it was almost dead/died quickly once the GPS was on. If it weren't for this issue, then I would give this 5 stars. I still do recommend this device for golfers looking to improve their game. It helps us tremendously when it comes to appropriate club selection.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable as a GPS tracker as it reboots and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable as a GPS tracker as it reboots and cannot continue automatically on the hole played. Characters on hazards hard to discern.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Lloyd Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Fairly accurate
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Fairly accurate. Needs charging more often than I had hoped. Helpful on the golf course!
customer_reviews.author: patsy mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Good!
customer_reviews.text: Still cannot get it to load my local course (Hillandale Country Club, Corinth, MS). 5 months and counting... Customer service? None so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rtdaltonjr

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: It gave all the information I need without any useless fluff
customer_reviews.author: Alan Huckerby

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but a bit difficult to operate. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: James Chirgwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accurate and convenient. I would say it definitely helped knock a couple strokes off of my score.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've played about 15 rounds with it and picked about 10 strokes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaysen Vollertsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is pretty accurate on the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: I'm woman golfer and Like that it's so thin
customer_reviews.text: I'm woman golfer and Like that it's so thin, had a garmin watch range finder that was very thick and heavy on my arm (still works but gave it to my husband). This watch is a pain to setup the first time, but works great once it is. Distances seem accurate when compared to friends using different devices, easy to read, needs recharged after every round (lasts for about 25 holes) I plug it into a wall charger instead of the computer. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tom Tom GPS watch is an excellent performer.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Tom Tom GPS watch. The details for the various hazards are very useful and easy to understand. It holds a long charge good enough to squeeze in two rounds when recently recharged. Especially appealing is the easy to read screen in high sunlight. I also like the square, flat face which is light with a low profile. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as USED. The watch didn't work. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as USED. The watch didn't work. Its now back with TomTom for repair. My advise be very careful buying secondhand products
customer_reviews.author: Richie Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Feel cheated. The golf channel convinced me with an ...
customer_reviews.text: Feel cheated. The golf channel convinced me with an incredible pitch. Can't use it because the instruction book is confusing. No one I know has your device. I believe that I received an outdated model that doesn't work. The guys in the pro shop couldn't help. Would appreciate any help
customer_reviews.author: Claire Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Great while travelling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend for xmas. Seemed to work very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. O.

customer_reviews.title: My husband's happy..
customer_reviews.text: My husband's happy...I'm happy...the retired man needs to stay busy so he doesn't become the house-husband who tells me how to run the microwave...toys are good!
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my FIL for his birthday. He loves it and raves about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennaasu

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Gift was for my husband for Christmas. He said it works great and is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jean LaRussa

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected! Was delivered on time, a quality product! Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: Juls

customer_reviews.title: Bogie on this watch
customer_reviews.text: Good golf gps watch, but Garmin is better. Style was good. Price is right if this is the watch you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: Not only is off by 15-20 yards, the battery doesn't last more than 10-12 holes. Wish I could still return it.
customer_reviews.author: John Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch is great
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great. Pretty accurate as far as I can tell. I did play two 18 hole rounds back to back and checked battery life after the first 18. It looked to be about 70%, but the watch died with 3 holes to go on the second 18, so I am a little disappointed with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: A few of the courses I played in northern michigan, were not downloaded on this item. Talked to Tom Tom and they said to download again. Havn't played those courses since, so don't know if the re-download worked. Played a bunker and water laden course,near my home, this gps picked up hazards on 2 of the 18 holes....I returned this product to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would rate higher except for wristban
customer_reviews.text: Good gps, very user friendly but buckle broke on 3rd day of play. TomTom promptly replaced the wristband !
customer_reviews.author: CARLBOY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as promised. No complaint. Help me get my range right. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: J. Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it ... Works great on course ..is very accurate ....tracks my walking and calories burned ....
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, looks good, and is accurate. The hazards are difficult to read. Otherwise a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Swanson

customer_reviews.title: good watch for golf
customer_reviews.text: good watch for golf. better than garmin. owened 2 garmins and both of them lost all info in them .
customer_reviews.author: Ernest W. Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Golf GPS
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Golf GPS. I wish the battery lasted a bit longer but it makes it through a round. Love the looks.
customer_reviews.author: James C Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking watch and a very nice golf gps
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch and a very nice golf gps. Although the screen is not touch screen, the navigation is pretty simple. the GPS signal is acquired quickly and all the advertised features are pretty easy to figure out. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: smitty

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised. . I purchased this device so that I could get accurate yardages for my next shot. This goal was met quickly and without a huge learning curve. I have not mastered all of the features of this device, nor do I think that I will want to. As I mentioned above the reason for this purchase was to identify yardage which this seems to do flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I really Like this Golf Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the real deal. Ease of operation, light on the wrist. There is a learning curve but not difficult. It has all the Courses I play and the graphics are really simple to see and read. In my opinion you get the most bang for the buck with this Tom Tom Golfer.
customer_reviews.author: George Monteleon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch, battery lasts for multiple rounds
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch, battery lasts for multiple rounds, has had every course so far I have played. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: crispy

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, bad accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this two stars is because of the styling and the software on the watch. This GPS has serious accuracy issues as compared with other devices that friends have. It was 20 yrds off on a 230 yd hole compared to Garmin watch and laser device (both of witch were withing 4 yds of each other). I don't need a watch to guess how close I am.....I want one to tell me. I used the support of the website, and updated the watch with the satellite locations, and it was off on two different courses. Too bad, as it is a beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: paulb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but put away for Christmas. If any issues I'll repost later
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Junk, sent back, just to small to view ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk, sent back, just to small to view for the elderly people over 50 with eye problems. Might work well for the thirty somethings.
customer_reviews.author: indymojo

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work Correctly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for a birthday gift. It did not work- had incorrect calculations to the greens, etc.. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: SFMmom

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful !!
customer_reviews.text: when I first received the product I was impressed with the quality and packaging. I got everything set up and used it a few days after I received it and it worked well. I charged it that evening to it out the next day and it completely froze up. I will be returning the watch and buying a Garmin which is the best in the business for this product !
customer_reviews.author: Mike thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very poor experience with Amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: The strap is damaged. The product does not work and as such is being returned. I do not need a replacement etc. Very poor experience with Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Sarwar

product_meta.title: TomTom Golfer (Blue)
product_meta.description: Style:Golfer| Color:BlueKnow every inch of the golf course with unique graphics and hazard distances. Keep track of the score, distance and time of your round
feature_bullets: Play with the latest course data
See remaining distance to lay points
Keep track of the score, distance and time of your round

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars403 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
